alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers, Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vilas, or 13 miles southeast of Springfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stonington around 1210 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
